course_description: In the Finance Lab, teams of students will work with professional coaches to research, develop and pitch an original investment strategy to institutional investors.  Drawing on insights from across other classes and using cutting-edge innovation and professional trading platforms, students define and present their proprietary investment strategy to a panel of institutional investors.  Students have the flexibility to specialise in strategies including ESG, emerging markets or digital currencies.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the MAF program.
sections: Class Nbr: 1326, Section #: 4201, Type: PRA, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 9:30a-12p, Instructor: K. Travers-Uyham, Status: Open
